description:
Mystras Leoxses is the older son of Darius Leoxses. He was a candidate for the next Knight-King of Sasan. He activated his Household Vessel of the Djinn http://anidb.net/ch80566 [Baal] during a fight with http://anidb.net/ch84285 [Hinahoho], and became one of http://anidb.net/ch63160 [Sinbad]`s Household Members.
He was replaced by his younger brother http://anidb.net/ch49494 [Spartos] as one of Sinbad`s Eight Generals following his death.
Source: Magi Wiki, edited.
name: Mystras Leoxses
